name: Gouging Fire
flavorText: There are scant few reports of this creature being sighted. One short video shows it rampaging and spouting pillars of flame.

previous.name: Hydrapple
previous.flavorText: Seven syrpents live inside an apple made of syrup. The syrpent in the center is the commander.

next.name: Raging Bolt
next.flavorText: It's said to incinerate everything around it with lightning launched from its fur. Very little is known about this creature.
